meanings.definition: To gain or receive money for work done
meanings.sent1: She earns money by helping her neighbors with chores.
meanings.sent2: He earns a paycheck every two weeks for his job at the store.
meanings.sent3: The hardworking squirrel earns nuts by collecting acorns all day.
meanings.sent4: The dedicated student earns knowledge through hours of studying.
meanings.sent5: The busy bee earns nectar by visiting flowers all day long.

meanings.definition: To acquire through effort or action
meanings.sent1: The athlete earns respect from fans through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: She earns a reputation for being reliable by always keeping her promises.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox earns a meal by outsmarting the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The determined explorer earns the title of 'adventurer' by traveling to remote places.
meanings.sent5: The persistent ant earns its place in the colony by working tirelessly.
